AppendCommand.description: The Firefox command line parametersdefined here , Can be inserted automatically when Firefox starts.
AppendCommand.name: Additional parameters

BlankNewTabChecked.description: You can remove the most frequently accessed thumbnails, and keep the theme effect
BlankNewTabChecked.name: Blank new tab page

BossKey.description: All browser windows can be hidden after pressing the boss key, press again to restore
BossKey.name: Boss key:

DPI.description: If the user interface enhances abnormally and shows that the zoom is not 100%, it should be changed to system DPI
DPI.name: System DPI:

DisableWebConfig.description: Turn off this web setting function
DisableWebConfig.name: Disable Web Settings

DoubleClickCloseTabChecked.description: Double-click on the label to close the page
DoubleClickCloseTabChecked.name: double-click close tab

EndRun.description: "The program here will start when Firefox is closed (for example by running the taskkill command to end the process)
EndRun.name: Run when closed

FrontNewTabChecked.name: Open a new label in the foreground

GestureResultChecked.description: whether to display the recognition result
GestureResultChecked.name: show results

GestureSensitive.description: The lower the value the higher the success rate but the higher the error rate, and vice versa.
GestureSensitive.name: Sensitivity:

GestureTrackChecked.description: whether to display the gesture track
GestureTrackChecked.name: show track

HandleMenuChecked.description: Try to open bookmark via menu, please close if there is any side effect
HandleMenuChecked.name: Processing pop-up menu

HostsSwitchChecked.description: hosts will be opened only when enabled
HostsSwitchChecked.name: Enabled

HoverActivateTabChecked.description: Hovering the tab over a certain period of time will automatically activate the tab.
HoverActivateTabChecked.name: Hover activation tab

HoverActivateTabDelay.description: How long after hover activation tab, in milliseconds
HoverActivateTabDelay.name: Hover time:

HoverTabSwitchChecked.description: scroll the wheel to switch between tabs when hovering over the tab bar
HoverTabSwitchChecked.name: hover fast label switch

KeepLastTabChecked.description: By creating a new tag, notice that you can not block it when you click the close button manually.
KeepLastTabChecked.name: prevent closing the entire browser when closing the last label

KeyIgnoreEditChecked.description: Even if the cursor is still in the edit box conversion button
KeyIgnoreEditChecked.name: Ignore edit box

KeyRepeatChecked.description: Press the button does not let go, whether to repeat recognition
KeyRepeatChecked.name: Identify duplicates

KillAtEndChecked.description: End these programs automatically when Firefox is closed
KillAtEndChecked.name: End program automatically

MakePortableChecked.description: Turn on to prevent computer replacement, loss of personal settings when reinstalling the system. Once user data has been generated, modifying this option will cause personal settings to be reset
MakePortableChecked.name: Portable

MouseGestureChecked.description: A mouse gesture with the extension disabled (with the right-click quick tab switch also turned off)
MouseGestureChecked.name: Enabled

NotBlankTabChecked.description: When the current page is a new tab, the above two options (open a bookmark in a new tab and open a URL in a new tab) will not take effect
NotBlankTabChecked.name: new tab does not take effect

OpenUrlNewTabChecked.description: The URL entered in the address bar opens in a new tab (via the Enter key)
OpenUrlNewTabChecked.name: new label open url

RemoveDevelopErrorChecked.description: If you use developer mode to load an extension, there is a warning when opening Firefox. This option turns off the warning.
RemoveDevelopErrorChecked.name: Remove Developer Mode Warning

RemoveUpdateErrorChecked.description: Offline package without update, click on Firefox will be updated when there is an error message, this option can be closed error message
RemoveUpdateErrorChecked.name: remove update error

RightClickCloseTabChecked.description: Turn on this option, hold down <kbd>SHIFT</kbd> and then right-click to restore the open menu
RightClickCloseTabChecked.name: right click close tab

RightTabSwitchChecked.description: Hold down the right mouse button, scroll the wheel to switch labels (this feature will affect the mouse gesture of the extension, but FireDoge gestures are not affected)
RightTabSwitchChecked.name: right-click quick label switch

StartRun.description: The program here will start with Firefox, and if the path (including variables) contains spaces, enclose it in double quotes
StartRun.name: Run at startup

SyncToken.description: Enter Gesture Sync Token to sync gestures between different devices
SyncToken.name: Gesture Sync Token

TrackArrowChecked.description: whether the gesture track is drawn as an arrow
TrackArrowChecked.name: track arrow

TrackThickness.description: Track thickness of the mouse gesture
TrackThickness.name: track thickness:

TrainingModeChecked.description: An unrecognized gesture will be added as a new gesture when enabled.
TrainingModeChecked.name: learning mode

InnerTexts.AppendCommandL1: The Firefox command line parametersdefined here Can be inserted automatically when Firefox starts
InnerTexts.AppendCommandL2: Enter the parameters you want to append
InnerTexts.EndRunL1: The program here will start when the browser is closed (hidden execution, for some cleanup work, such as running the taskkill command to end the process)
InnerTexts.EndRunL2: Enter the program you want to shut down when running
InnerTexts.HelloL1: If you like FireDoge, you can give me a star
InnerTexts.HelloL2: his environment variable supports %appdata% in the path. The special %app% represents the directory where the program is currently located
InnerTexts.HelloL3: some settings need to restart the browser to take effect, delete FireDoge.ini can be reset to the default settings
InnerTexts.HelloL4: This page translate by Google Translate
InnerTexts.HelloL5: Click me open the folder where FireDoge.ini is located
InnerTexts.StartRunL1: The program will start with the browser,if the path (including variables expanded) contains spaces, enclosed in double quotes
InnerTexts.StartRunL2: Enter the program you want to run at startup
InnerTexts.TransListL2: Enter the button you want to convert
InnerTexts.GestureL1: Please turn on the mouse gesture at the top
InnerTexts.HostsL1: hosts provide users download address, hosts file can provide the domain name to IP mapping, this feature will not affect the system hosts, if you still can not access some sites, please contact the hosts provider feedback.The program will update hosts once a day
InnerTexts.UpdateL1: Your currently used {{product}}({{version}}) online version is: {{nversion}}

PText.alertAddNew: gesture recognition is closed, please start to draw the gesture, then draw the gesture will be added .Please note the difference with the existing gestures, or it will affect the gesture recognition rate.After adding, click the OK button to refresh the list .
PText.alertUnavailable: You can not modify the FireDoge settings through this interface. Please check whether the global proxy is enabled, whether the VPN is anti-virus software, whether the firewall intercept is extended by advertisement, or intercepted by the software.
PText.alertUpdate: There is a new version of FireDoge, please go to https://github.com/TkYu/FireDoge/releases to get the latest version?
PText.alertExportDiag: Click the OK button You will export the diagnostic information of the current FireDoge environment, please check before you upload the file and make sure it does not contain the information you do not want to publish!
